item.title: By: Doron Hirsch
item.dc:creator: Doron Hirsch
item.description: עמית, אני שמח לשמוע שיש שינוי כיוון בהצלחה דורון
item.content:encoded:
עמית,
אני שמח לשמוע שיש שינוי כיוון
בהצלחה
דורון

item.title: By: Shaul
item.dc:creator: Shaul
item.description: I'm told that if you write something offensive and then add a smiley after, then it's ok
item.content:encoded: I’m told that if you write something offensive and then add a smiley after, then it’s ok

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:D Funny stuff. Obviously, you're not a big fan.
And like I told you - if The Prodigy come to Israel, you're coming with me to see the live show that will ruin all other live shows for you.
item.content:encoded:
:D Funny stuff. Obviously, you’re not a big fan.

And like I told you – if The Prodigy come to Israel, you’re coming with me to see the live show that will ruin all other live shows for you.

item.title: By: Shahar Kuchuk
item.dc:creator: Shahar Kuchuk
item.description:
Hey, Read your last posts and (other then enjoying them) found an amazing thing! It is possible to the activate two different YouTube clips.
I found this feature so appealing that I immediately activated all of the clips in the page.
Now guess what was my first impression? A single Prodigy clip sounds exactly like 3 of them playing together!!! :)
item.content:encoded:
Hey,
Read your last posts and (other then enjoying them) found an amazing thing!
It is possible to the activate two different YouTube clips.

I found this feature so appealing that I immediately activated all of the clips in the page.

Now guess what was my first impression?
A single Prodigy clip sounds exactly like 3 of them playing together!!! :)
